Personal Client Services

Allow us to empower you during times of personal crises. Our private investigators utilize their independence and diverse set of tools to uncover the truth through fact-finding, surveillance, and open-source intelligence.

√ Fact-Finding: Expose the truth through in-depth investigation that exhausts unexplored leads, unearths new evidence, and identifies new witnesses.
√ Surveillance: Gain insights and extract valuable information with discreet surveillance.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffa40d” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”70px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://lauthinvestigations.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/bbb.webp” alt=”BBB Accredited Business lauth investigations” title_text=”bbb” url=”https://www.bbb.org/us/in/indianapolis/profile/investigator/lauth-investigations-international-inc-0382-8002502″ url_new_window=”on” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_4,1_4″ admin_label=”Testimonial Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”1280px” custom_margin=”10px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”||11px|||” use_custom_width=”on” custom_width_px=”1280px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://lauthinvestigations.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/stars-5.png” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||0px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”16%” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_testimonial author=”Nicole H.” quote_icon=”off” _builder_version=”4.16″ body_font=”||||||||” body_font_size=”16px” author_line_height=”0em” use_background_color=”off” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Thomas Lauth and his team are, quite simply, incredible. Smart, creative, compassionate, efficient, and always there. When my friend’s daughter went missing, we engaged Lauth to find her, and they did. The nightmare Lauth helped shepherd us through didn’t end there, however. The next phase involved getting the endangered young woman to safety. I still marvel at the quick-thinking, creative solutions Lauth and his team of caring experts came up with in the seconds, minutes, hours and days that followed. Lauth also acted quickly to provide a deep list of contacts (mental health, social workers, lawyers, advocates, organizations in Indianapolis where we were) they help us secure the young women’s complex needs. For our unexpected, volatile, chaotic and heartbreaking situation, it was so very good to have Thomas Lauth study expertise to count on. Can’t ever think him and his lead investigator enough.

Diving Into Our Diverse Divisions

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffa40d” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”70px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.0″ text_font_size=”21px” text_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”100%” animation_direction=”left” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our private investigation firm encompasses an array of divisions, each employing the best in intelligence-gathering operations and technology. As your strategic intelligence partners, our top priority is providing context and clarity so that you can make crucial decisions without complexity or confusion.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”Practice Area” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ background_enable_color=”off” width=”66%” module_alignment=”center” use_custom_width=”on” custom_width_px=”1280px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.24.0″ background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”||28px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://lauthinvestigations.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/lauth-investigations-team.jpg” title_text=”lauth-investigations-team” url=”http://www.lii-returnassets.com/” show_bottom_space=”off” force_fullwidth=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ custom_margin=”||30px|” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_zoom=”2%” border_width_bottom=”7px” border_color_bottom=”#828d99″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” link_font=”|700||on|||||” link_text_color=”#ffba60″ header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”|600|||||||” header_4_font_size=”22px” header_4_line_height=”0.8em” width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Return Assets Division

Did you know that 1-in-10 individuals have unclaimed assets? Our dedicated team is devoted to reuniting lost assets with their rightful owners, stimulating the economy in the process. Through thorough research, due diligence, and collaboration with claimants, we strive to make a positive impact. More than merely recovering financial resources, we believe in restoring a sense of justice and ownership.

EXPLORE RETURN ASSETS DIVISION

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.24.0″ background_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://lauthinvestigations.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/iStock-1088374148.jpg” alt=”Heir Search Services with Lauth Investigations” title_text=”Lauth Consultant giving advices to the heir” url=”/attorney-and-legal-services/” show_bottom_space=”off” force_fullwidth=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ custom_margin=”||30px|” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_zoom=”2%” border_width_bottom=”7px” border_color_bottom=”#4a5868″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” link_font=”||||||||” link_text_color=”#ffba60″ header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”|600|||||||” header_4_font_size=”22px” header_4_line_height=”0.8em” width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||7px|||” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Heir Search Division

Lauth is committed to simplifying the process of reconnecting with your family’s legacy. We map family trees and mend broken branches so that heirs are able reclaim unrecovered assets that are rightfully theirs. Our goal is to guide you through the process of recovering both financial assets and your lawful heritage.

EXPLORE HEIR SEARCH DIVISION
